product_highlights: Responsible Person services for non-EU companies
key_benefits: Essential for non-EU brands entering Europe
Brexit transition support for UK brands
notes: Cosmetic Science & Regulatory Associates (CSRA) is a UK-based consultancy specializing in EU cosmetics regulation compliance. They are essential for non-EU manufacturers who need a Responsible Person to legally sell cosmetics in the European market. CSRA provides comprehensive services including Cosmetic Product Safety Reports (CPSR) by qualified safety assessors, Product Information Files (PIF), and CPNP portal notifications. They also provide valuable Brexit transition guidance for UK brands navigating post-Brexit regulatory changes. With multilingual capabilities and fast turnaround times, CSRA is ideal for international brands entering the European market.
